text:
It would be nice if both "Could not get next bucket brigade" and "An error
occurred while reading the request body" both included the filename that they
were working on.

Similar to:

err = dav_new_error(r->pool, HTTP_INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR, 0,
	apr_psprintf(r->pool, "Could not get next bucket brigade: %s (WRITTEN: %i)",
r->filename, total_written));

where total_written is the total number of bytes written when the error occurred.
